story_setup:
Students in the introductory bio class almost always have passing grades on the exam.
Mark's 3 intro bio students took an exam yesterday.
priorQ: How many of the 3 exams do you think have passing grades?
speach: Mark tells you on the phone: 'I have looked at 2 of the 3 exams. 2 of the exams have passing grades.'
speachQ: Now how many of the 3 exams do you think have passing grades?
knowledgeQ: Do you think Mark knows exactly how many of the 3 exams have passing grades?

story_setup:
Letters to Laura's company almost always have checks inside.
Today Laura received 3 letters.
priorQ: How many of the 3 letters do you think have checks inside?
speach: Laura tells you on the phone: 'I have looked at 3 of the 3 letters. 1 of the letters has checks inside.'
speachQ: Now how many of the 3 letters do you think have checks inside?
knowledgeQ: Do you think Laura knows exactly how many of the 3 letters have checks inside?

story_setup:
Tickets in the DoubleDay instant lottery almost always win.
Joe bought 3 DoubleDay tickets yesterday.
priorQ: How many of the 3 tickets do you think have won?
speach: Joe tells you on the phone: 'I have looked at 3 of the 3 tickets. 2 of the tickets have won.'
speachQ: Now how many of the 3 tickets do you think have won?
knowledgeQ: Do you think Joe knows exactly how many of the 3 tickets have won?

story_setup:
Mongines are small fruits that almost always have dried out pith inside.
Monica bought 3 mondrine fruits yesterday.
priorQ: How many of the 3 fruits do you think have dried out pith?
speach: Monica tells you on the phone: 'I have looked at 1 of the 3 fruits. 1 of the fruits has dried out pith.'
speachQ: Now how many of the 3 fruits do you think have dried out pith?
knowledgeQ: Do you think Monica knows exactly how many of the 3 fruits have dried out pith?

story_setup:
Broken Sigo phones almost always have burned out transistors.
Ben must repair 3 broken Sigo phones.
priorQ: How many of the 3 phones do you think have burned out transistors?
speach: Ben tells you on the phone: 'I have looked at 2 of the 3 phones. 1 of the phones has burned out transistors.'
speachQ: Now how many of the 3 phones do you think have burned out transistors?
knowledgeQ: Do you think Ben knows exactly how many of the 3 phones have burned out transistors?

story_setup:
Corendula seeds almost always sprout within a day when put into water.
Two days ago, botanist Jim put 3 Corendula seeds into water.
priorQ: How many of the 3 seeds do you think have sprouted?
speach: Jim tells you on the phone: 'I have looked at 3 of the 3 seeds. 3 of the seeds have sprouted.'
speachQ: Now how many of the 3 seeds do you think have sprouted?
knowledgeQ: Do you think Jim knows exactly how many of the 3 seeds have sprouted?
